title: Citgo Considers Buying Venezuela Oil Again Amid Pending Sale
description: Citgo Petroleum Corp., the US refiner indirectly owned by Venezuela, may emerge as one of the biggest beneficiaries of President Donald Trump’s plan to bring millions of barrels of the country’s oil to the US.
content: Citgo Petroleum Corp., the US refiner indirectly owned by Venezuela, may emerge as one of the biggest beneficiaries of President Donald Trump’s plan to bring millions of barrels of the country’s oil to the US.
